alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 9:53PM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. The heaviest snowfall amounts will be in Tazewell and Smyth Counties. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Tazewell, Smyth and Grayson Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Monday to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be in the teens or lower by Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
